input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Aero Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Xl Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Legion Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Brevet Logo-Print Mesh-Panelled Recycled Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Flyweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha St Raphael Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Classic Flyweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Brevet Element Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Aero XS Pro Team Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Core 2 Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Jersey Men's Long Sleeve'
  - Name='men Santini Paris-Roubaix 2025 Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Uci World Champion Jersey Mondo Man'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT C2 Evo Jersey Ultra Blood'
  - Name='Assos Dyora RS Speed Club 2024 Top-Tier Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Dyora R Women's Jersey S11'
  - Name='Sportful BodyFit Team Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Aero Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is an aero cycling jersey from Rapha, similar in function and purpose as a high-performance cycling jersey, likely with advanced materials and fit, closely matching the Core Jersey's performance orientation.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A Pro Team Crit jersey from Rapha implies a high-performance cycling jersey designed for criterium racing, similar in lightweight, moisture-wicking features and aerodynamic fit suitable for intense cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Xl Pro Team Crit Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same product as above but size indicated; the core product remains a high-performance cycling jersey, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Legion Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An aero cycling jersey designed for performance rides, sharing key characteristics such as lightweight construction, moisture management, and aerodynamic fit with the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Brevet Logo-Print Mesh-Panelled Recycled Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a recycled cycling jersey with mesh panels, emphasizing sustainability similar to the reference product; possibly slightly different in construction but very relevant due to fabric and eco-friendly angle.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-performance cycling jersey from the Pro Team line; likely similar in function and features though without specifying aero or crit focus, still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An aero Pro Team cycling jersey, matching the key features of the reference product: lightweight, performance-oriented, form-fitting, and moisture-wicking.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General Pro Team cycling jersey, likely similar in construction and purpose but less specific about aero features, still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Classic Flyweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A lightweight cycling jersey, but 'Classic' and 'Flyweight' suggests possibly a different fit or weight class; still relevant as a cycling jersey but potentially less technical compared to Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha St Raphael Men's Pro Team Aero Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A specific version of the Pro Team aero jersey, matching the reference's functional and performance features closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product line ('Core'), lightweight cycling jersey directly matching the reference product in name and likely construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Training jersey from the Pro Team line, likely shares moisture-wicking and fit features but may differ in aerodynamic focus; still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Classic Flyweight Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above Classic Flyweight jersey, likely lighter and perhaps less structured, but still a cycling jersey relevant to the category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another variation of Pro Team training jersey with likely similar performance features suitable for intense riding, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Brevet jerseys typically focus on endurance rides, implying durability and comfort over aero performance; somewhat relevant but possibly differing in focus from the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: An aero, extra small Pro Team jersey emphasizing aerodynamic fit and lightweight materials aligning closely with the reference product.
